job_lists.title: Data Analyst
job_lists.company: 台灣米高蒲志國際股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
About Our Client

A multinational, fast growing start-up





What's on Offer

International exposure and flexible working hours with good employment benefits






Job Description

Responsibilities:
 * You will implement and validate predictive models and create and maintain statistical models
 with a focus on big data
 * You will communicate with internal and external clients to understand business needs and
 provide analytical solutions.
 * You will use statistical concepts such as regression, time series, mixed model, Bayesian methods,
 clustering, etc., to analyze data and provide insights.
 * You will work in an Agile, collaborative environment, partnering with other scientists, engineers,
 and database administrators of all backgrounds and disciplines to bring analytical rigor and statistical
 methods to the challenges of predicting behaviors
job_lists.other_condition:
Required experience and skills:
 * Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN,
 Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests,
 etc.
 * Experience with common data science toolkits, such as R, Weka, NumPy, MatLab, etc. Excellence
 in at least one of these is highly desirable
 * Great communication skills
 * Experience with data visualisation tools, such as D3.js, GGplot, etc.
 * Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig
 * Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc.
 * Data-oriented personality

本開發團隊專注於各類型連鎖體系（餐飲、零售）所需的ERP、進銷存等 Web 應用軟體開發，並結合本公司既有硬體設計、製造專長，企望爲各型態連鎖體系提供完整資訊系統解決方案，提升相關業務之執行效率。

工作內容涵括：
＊參與 ERP、進銷存、Web BI 報表管理系統、POS相關Web管理系統...等專案之開發工作
＊依據客戶需求作系統分析，並進行軟體架構設計
＊活用物件導向、Design Pattern、MVC 等概念於軟體開發過程中
＊研發雲端、資訊安全、統計、BI 相關應用
＊開發工具： Visual Studio、MS SQL Server
＊程式語言：C#、HTML、JavaScript、JQuery、SQL

本團隊極具軟體開發熱情，樂於學習、嘗試創新技術。對於程式開發並不滿足於＂完成需求就好＂，而是力求架構的合理性、完整性、擴充性、穩定度，並且以自己的產品為傲。
另外，部門氣氛和諧，不分資歷深淺皆樂於交流分享，意見想法會被充分尊重。

如果您認同這是一個有理想、值得共同打拼、能使您＂向上提昇＂的團隊，歡迎來面談，讓我們雙方有彼此了解的機會。
job_lists.other_condition:
＊熟悉 C# 及 SQL
＊熟悉 ASP .Net MVC、HTML、JavaScript、jQuery、AJAX

前端：
1.ASP.Net、ASP.Net MVC
2.Html
3.JavaScript、JQuery
程式語言：
1.C#
資料庫：
1.MS SQL Server

除了基本程式技能，本團隊也相當注重＂工作態度＂：

＊對軟體程式開發具熱情，平時即熱愛吸收相關技術新知（這就是本團隊的工作氣氛！）
＊對於程式開發不僅僅滿足於功能完成就好，而是能自我要求 ＂架構做得對、做得好＂
（這也是本團 隊的期許目標！）
＊願意分享開發心得，與團隊共同成長（這就是本團隊的特質，同仁不論資歷深淺都樂於主動交流）

另外，如果同時具備以下任一能力則更佳：

＊應用軟體系統分析（SA）、系統設計（SD）實務經驗
＊物件導向、Design Pattern、UML分析、MVC經驗
＊能同時處裡多個交付任務，應付產品多樣性
＊軟體測試概念、方法，TDD，自動測試建置經驗
＊熟悉餐飲、零售/量販營運模式，或ERP、CRM、進銷存軟體使用經驗
＊CMMI、Agile（Scrum）軟體開發流程實務經驗
＊SOA架構概念
＊雲端server建置
＊資訊安全

job_lists.content: 這是一個充滿挑戰與機會的工作，讓對軟韌體充滿熱誠與願景的你可以一展長才的機會。負責多媒體平台相關軟韌體的開發工作，涵蓋不同應用與客戶需求的開發，需要不斷創新與突破。基礎技能 : 1. 熟悉C、C++的程式開發技巧。2. 熟悉Visual studio 與 GNU 開發工具。3. 對程式充滿熱誠，對新技術充滿學習慾望，不畏懼挑戰。  加分技能 :     1. 影音壓縮演算法，實做與應用相關經驗。    2. 影音串流平台相關經驗。    3. 嵌入式系統開發經驗。    4. 跨平台應用程式開發能力(Windows、Linux、MAC OSX、Android…)。

來信應徵請附作品集與履歷，履歷內請詳述學習過的程式語言，以及執行過的專案（包含個人具體貢獻與專案成果）。

c) 負責演算法的移植和產品化
job_lists.other_condition:
- 熟悉人工感知、定位、控制演算法並進行模擬仿真分析
- 熟悉相關傳感器如LiDAR的使用和數據分析
- 熟悉視覺SLAM演算法或基於LiDAR的SLAM演算法
- 精通Python / C++等語言編程，具有良好的編程習慣，能夠熟練使用相關工具進行數據分析；
- 研發自主導航之路徑規劃、運動規則及規劃導航演算法，未知環境之地圖構建算法及優化等後端演算法，包括SLAM問題中的信息配準融合
- 具備良好的團隊合作和溝通能力，與良好的學習能力

job_lists.title: 資深軟體工程師 Senior Software Engineer （嘉義）
job_lists.company: 阿物股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
一位awoo同仁在面試時我們問他＂你有機會去矽谷發展，為什麼要留在台灣?＂ 

他回答：如果台灣年輕人都把努力的成果留在外國，那台灣怎麼辦？台灣人就是要留在台灣奮鬥，台灣才會強！ 

別吃驚，這就是awoo人的個性。你在這將會遇到參與過318學運 柯文哲台北市選舉 反黑箱課綱....等公民活動的同仁，我們相信，台灣值得成為一個更好的國家。 

就像棒球選手陽岱綱說：身為台灣人的我們如果都不愛自己 那 誰來愛台灣？ 

我們不是反國際化，而是要讓awoo成為一間全世界的人都想來台灣工作的企業。 
“趨勢科技創辦人張明正曾說：住在台灣為全世界工作，其實才是Dream Job（夢幻工作）。” 

這就是我們正在打造的夢想，不一起嗎？ 

awoo軟體產品 www.awoo.org 
（超過8000間企業使用，台灣最多企業使用的行銷SaaS） 
球來就打 https://www.awoo.org/intro/poa 
天下無狗 https://www.awoo.org/intro/kelo 
追夢人 https://www.awoo.org/intro/trend 


媒體實際應用報導 
https://www.cool3c.com/article/113591 
http://www.techbang.com/posts/47588-ball-hits 

好！回到工作細節！ 
如果你具備以下條件，歡迎你跟我們聊聊呀～ 
1. 三年以上程式開發經驗 
2. 熟 PHP / CodeIgniter 
3. 熟 Javascript/jQuery 
4. 熟 Linux/BSD 操作 
5. 熟 mySQL 

加分題： 
有機器學習或Crawler經驗
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

The Senior Computer Vision Software Engineer will be working on new cutting-edge technology in Virtual Reality application designed and built by Digital Domain. You will mainly lead and contribute to the team project at every level of the software stack and have the opportunity to work on the full software development lifecycle: from R&D of new ideas to the release of ground breaking products. • Programming experience with computer vision and/or 3D geometry libraries (e.g. OpenCV, PCL) is a plus.

Skills, Abilities, Special Licenses or Certificate: 
• The ideal candidate will have industry experience in computer vision, image processing, Object-oriented programming principles, knowledge of Design patterns, GPU programming and machine learning is a plus. The candidate will also have been involved in successful software releases.

job_lists.title: Lead Developer - Growth Engineering
job_lists.company: Nogle Taiwan Limited_諾傑股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are forming a new Growth Engineering team at Style.me to focus on 
improving our 3D scanning process and scalability of our virtual try-on 
platform. 
As the Lead Developer, you will drive the automation of various processes
and build software alongside and on top of our existing systems. You will
also get to work with advanced technology spanning computer graphics,
computer vision, physics-based simulation, and our US-patented 3D 
geometry modeling algorithms.
This is a position that will contribute tremendously to the success of our
product launches in the US and then globally. If you are a master 
software engineer that can navigate complex systems and solve problems
creatively, then we would love to talk to you.

Responsibilities:
- Lead a team of talented engineers to build tools for managing and 
scaling our 3D scanning process and our virtual try-on platform
- Be both a technical hands-on coder and people manager
- Work with the product teams to find the optimal way to scale our 
systems
- Provide technical leadership and guidance to your team and project 
peers
- Automate data validation, quality control, and client integration 
workflows
- Solve the hardest software performance issues: Work with software 
developers closely to improve code base performance (e.g. algorithm redesign) and shorten request latency
- Develop tools to monitor billions of try-ons: Write monitoring and 
reporting tools to do performance-related tests and analysis
- Identify bottleneck issues proactively and work with systems, network 
and engineering teams to discover resolutions
job_lists.other_condition:
Requirements:
- BS degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Operations 
Research or other technical field
- 6+ years of software engineering experience using C++, Java, or Python
- 3+ years of experience leading software engineers
- Interpersonal and communication skills
- Experience working with cross-functional teams
- Experience in performance engineering
- Experience in using various libraries in machine learning and image 
processing

將Deep learning技術融合到APP跟生活中是我們的目標

公司第一個產品Bite  大受好評中！
https://www.facebook.com/2bite.tw/

在產品中，需要不斷用大量的將AI（人工智慧）技術轉換的消費者的語言
比如從美食自動辨識分類 到 不同人的美食個性
都需要將最新的科技，最後利用APP的設計的思考 與 設計的表達能力
最後成為產品

相信用Deep learning技術接觸一般大眾產生的big data都是DP工程師所夢寐以求的

數位左右絕對是一個漂亮的舞台，希望你來！
(目前每個月產出5萬張消費者來自APP的食物照片）

工 作 內 容 

1.電腦視覺系統架構規劃與設計參與
2.研發物件識別與演算法
3. Machine Learning中，深度學習感知Deep Learning演算架構設計、模擬及開發

·       Image matching
·       Image classification
·       Restaurant attribute recognition
 


公司介紹

致力於研發社群產品
Bite
https://itunes.apple.com/tw/app/bite!/id964725870?l=zh&mt=8

於是我們創造人們＂吃＂的娛樂成為第一個CV的社群

社群資訊服務+ 影像自動辨識演算法 的技術放入在手機APP、

最後在融合UI/UX設計的 社群科技設計公司

公司擁有很好的工作夥伴及環境

目前已經有3位Backend developer + 4位IOS+2位Android
+2位平面與動態設計+ 3位行銷企畫

工作遠景

APP+AI+Backend+design+community 希望能改變世界的全新組合

從想法藍圖到成立公司已經經歷4年多.....

我們知道大量的資料一直都是Deep learning跟視覺辨識系統最大的關鍵

所以設計了娛樂面的APP，讓使用者體驗到AI的好處之外，Data回饋給電腦變的更精準，

同時也與台灣最頂尖的CV的工程師與博士長期合作，一群待過GOOGLE FACEBOOK 、MIT

大學的夥伴們!你將會與他們學習合作之外，也會了解國際一流的最新技術

這絕對是一場最前衛的冒險在這世界找到Computer Vision的答案

希望你的加入!
=====================================

主要深入與使用的技術有

Computer Vision 
Deep learning
Hashing Method

job_lists.title: 資料庫管理師 DBA
job_lists.company: 格明數位媒體有限公司
job_lists.content:
[工作內容]
大型網站後端 DB 的運作、架設、維護、管理，規劃、執行資料庫調教、備援及回覆計畫。 
1. 管理各項資料庫資源使用，包含使用量、權限管理、使用空間、系統資源（CPU、Memory、IO）等。 
2. 負責資料庫系統維護、備份、備援、同步、監控等日常管理，並適時針對相關參數及SQL進行調校。 
3. 配合系統開發人員進行資料庫系統的架構規劃，提供database schema設計建議。
4. 分析營運需求以規劃並開發Data Warehouse及Business Intelligence。 配合相關業務部門進行資料分析及數據挖掘等工作。 
5. 建置 High Availability (HA)，創建最佳資料庫架構。 
6. 熟SQL操作與使用、SQL語法(如Stored Procedure)撰寫；協助DevOps團隊做壓力測試，有效能調校經驗者佳。 
7. 有 MS-SQL 架設、管理、維護、備份/還原，資料庫管理相關經驗2年以上！ 
8. 有能力執行大型企業的資料庫管理或是版本昇級、備援、容錯設計等使用經驗者佳。 
9. 具工作熱誠、負責細心、主動解決問題能力、能團隊合作、討論、分享。
job_lists.other_condition:
加分條件：
1.有大型資料庫(環境/資料表/檢視表/預存程序/函數等)設定、規劃、程式設計撰寫等經驗者佳
2.了解 vmware 虛擬化主機安裝、設定與管理

job_lists.title: Software Engineer in aFleX development

job_lists.content:
aFleX is a Tcl based scripting language used in A10 ACOS. It is used to inspect, modify, and direct data plane network traffic. aFleX works on L2/3 all the way to L7. As a member of aFleX team, you will participate in the design and development of aFleX events and commands, as well as integrate them into current ACOS data plane. You will be developing software for high performance multi core computing environment. You will take ownership for critical software components and work with product management on customer requirements. You will work with architecture and engineering team to develop functional design, utilize your programming skills to produce robust and efficient implementation. You will interact with many other teams including platform, L2/3, L4/7, quality assurance, customer support and tech pubs in the full software product development life cycle.
  
Required Skills and Experience:

Proven track record in Design and Development and able to demonstrate strong proficiency in
● Excellent C programming/debugging skills
● Experience in multi-threading / multi-core environment
● Good networks knowledges from Layer 3 to Layer 7
● Good verbal and written communication skills in English
 
Required Qualifications:
● Minimum BS in CS, CE or EE
● Senior level positions require minimum of 5 years of directly relevant experience
● Can do attitude, self-starter and quick-learner
● Able to multi-task and collaborate with others in a team environment
● English CV/resume

Not Required but Highly Desirable Skills and Experience:
● Good understanding of
   1. TCP/IP stack
   2. Script languages, such as Tcl, Python, Lua ...
   3. L7 protocols, such as HTTP/HTTP2, SIP, SMTP, Diameter ...
   4. Compiler
● Familiar with network tools, such as wireshark, tcpdump, ...
● Experience in complete software development cycle and Unit testing frameworks

We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including global standard mobile banking/payment covering credit/debit contact/contactless , and SIM/embedded SIM of Telco Applications, etc. 
As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Taisys needs in our fast-paced business growing and evolving. We need our engineers to be smart, versatile, display leadership of qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.
In this role, you will be in charge of Java card applet design and development. You will be working on new firmware development, configuration management, certificate, and performance improvement. 
RESPONSIBILITY：
1. Design and implement firmware for smart card systems.
2. Design and implement tools for system bring-up, debugging, and performance/power evaluation.

MUST Qualifications
1. BS/MS degree in EE/CS or relevant technical field 
2. 3 years equivalent practical experience.
3. Strong ability and experience in C , Java programming skills
4.     Able to read specs in English
5.     Eager to study new technology
6.     Self motivation and creative.
job_lists.other_condition:
Plus skills:
1. The experience of Java card applet programming will be a plus.
2. Working experience in mobile device sector
4. Experience in Payment Java Applet – PBOC/MChip Mobile sector.
5. Familiar with Message Security mechanism.

job_lists.title: Java Card 設計驗証工程師
job_lists.company: 太思科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
POSITION OVERVIEW：
As a Test Engineer of Smart Card - Java Card applet team, you’ll work closely with outstanding global engineering teams to help implementation of the smart card testing in a fast-paced dynamic environment.
 
Test Engineers of Smart Card aren't manual testers only - you write scripts to automate testing and create tools so developers can test their own code. 
You navigate DTG code base, identify weak spots and constantly design better and creative ways to identify potential problems. You’ll combine your technical ability, strategic thinking and detail-oriented execution to influence better software design, promote proper engineering practice, bug prevention strategies, test ability, accessibility, privacy, and other advanced quality concepts across products.
You'll have impact on the quality of Taisys growing products and services.
You will own one of the key customer satisfaction metrics - functional performance of the device. You are a key member of the cross-functional team that will launch the product.

RESPONSIBILITY：
• Design and implement DTG functional tests to validate the correctness and performance. Make recommendations to design and test coverage improvement with minimal engineering engagement.
• Develop with Design/Engineering teams functional specs and test plan for the product testing for mass production release.
• Be responsible for implementation, yield and parametric data, correlation, etc. along with playing point into Design Engineering teams for test scripts, specs. requirements.

MUST QUALIFICATIONS：
• BS/MS degree in Engineering or equivalent practical experience.
• At least 3 years of experience in programming or testing products  
• Good logic thinking, have passion to learn and excel.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS：
• Proven experience in debug, troubleshooting, and failure analysis investigation.
• Experience with handsets, mobile device testing, bring up, and design validation.

job_lists.title: Backend Developer
job_lists.company: 沛星互動科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Back-End Software Engineer – 
Safari with extremely smart and self-driven people
Have front-end experience but want to accumulate more back-end experience? 
Great at back-end platforms but want to dabble with Artificial Intelligence?
Dreaming of growing with the smartest and self-driven people on this island?
Awesome! YOU are the one we are looking for to join this Safari solving the most difficult problems with AI technology.

We are…
At Appier, we solve the most difficult user problems and use AI technology to bring value to the world. How? Using AI technology, simply providing organized data for data scientists to analyze can no longer satisfies us. We break the barrier between human-machine and automate cognitive process of human mind, the best decision making which takes hundreds of thousands of human brain to achieve.

Going back to people, Appiers come with the best academic background and equip with best practices from the past experiences in tech giants such as Google, Yahoo...etc. 
Of course, what is impressive isn't where we are from, but what we've accomplished. We've launched the behavior analysis platform which can comprehensively understand anyone, at any time, on any devices. Just imagine we are the closest friend of everyone in the cyber world and can help you even before you think of. Can you imagine how powerful it is in different applications?

The Challenge...
We are creating more services generating tremendous value to the world using AI technology and with the incredible speed of the growth of our customers, we need experienced and the smartest people like you to design the most flexible, scalable back-end architecture with optimized performance to pave the engineering road of our new products.

We Love...
A true adventurer, a go-getter of an engineer who is self-motivated and driven and willing to involve in every aspect of the productization cycle from idea brainstorming to engineering art work.

Responsibility...
1. Design & develop server-side architecture & function logic of new services
2. Design and maintain database schemas for new services
3. Ensures the scalability of the system
4. Ensure the high performance of responsiveness to requests from the front-end
5. Integrate the front-end modules built by your coworkers into new services
6. Build reusable code and libraries for future use
7. Build unit tests and test automation
8. Handle and resolve issues escalated from the production operational environment
9. Perform code reviews
10. Participate in idea brainstorming and contribute ideas to technology, algorithms and products

job_lists.title: 金融科技(Fintech)大數據/演算分析工程師
job_lists.company: 好好投資科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
【好好說明】
1.知道Matlab且熟悉Python/Java等相關程式語言。 
2.熟悉數據統計分析工具及技術。
3.具應用數學、統計學及資訊工程等相關專業背景。 
4.具有大數據資料分析模組建立及程式設計與開發能力。 
5.具備Data/Text Mining/數值統計/Machine Learning相關研究或程式開發經驗。 
6.熟悉分散式運算、平行運算。 
7.熟SQL語法，如：MySQL、PostgreSQL or NoSQL, e.g. MongoDB。
8.有Linux系統使用經驗。
9.對機器學習、深度學習、人工智慧有興趣且具高度開發興趣。
10.能表現你對程式的熱誠的公開連結 (EX：Blog/Github/StackOverflow/SlideShare)。

【好好工作】
1.對金融數據，如價格、成交量、新聞等資料進行計算與處理。
2.管理分散式計算，並產出結果視覺化報表及優化模型。
3.資料庫架構規劃與開發。

【好好嚴選】
我們正在找人，但尋志同道合，寧缺也不願濫選！我們不只找員工，更覓共同打拼的事業夥伴，雖是新創公司，但福利絕對優於上市公司。

您應該看得出，我們不同一般公司更認真仔細地徵才，注重每個環節，這是我們做好一件小事的標準，我們是站在世界金融科技風口的團隊，也是「79%」一定會成功的新創公司！這剩下「21%」的不確定，等待優秀且舉足輕重的您來為我們補足，如您只是帶著打工的心態，請不要來！如希望找到環境好，福利佳，能力快速成長的公司，歡迎您來試試看。

【好好認識】
好好投資科技是剛成立一年的新創公司，是一個築夢踏實的年輕團隊(但我們的志氣大到將會翻轉生態)

公司的產業正是目前站在風口的金融+科技 (Fintech)領域，現正開發一個很有趣且特別的財富管理平台(Coming soon)，您可先參觀官方形象網站：www.howfintech.com

我們對於金融遇見科技的未來有著具體想像，即將運用人工智慧打破投資的專業門檻，改變傳統理財顧問與投資人的互動方式，我們要讓最需要理財的小資族，用非常簡單的方式直覺性投資！

公司團隊主要成員來自金融實務界的銀行家、外資證券老總及華爾街返台CTO，工程團隊從前端、後端、資料庫、演算法工程師都是新世代創客，現正用行動，希望能稍微為傳統金融帶入一點點不一樣…

【好好徵才】
(以下五項前提，任一未具備者勿投履歷)
1.對有金融科技有興趣與熱情，想參與最夯的金融科技專案。(您現在不需很懂金融，但要有興趣) 。
2.注重細節及使用流程，能從使用者角度思考。
3.對 Web、Mobile Web開發、新技術開發具高度興趣及熱忱。
4.具主動、獨立作業與思考能力、執行能力強、勇於跳出框架思考的能力。
5.能有良好溝通表達能力、擇善不固執及團隊精神。

【好好選擇】
1.我們重視工作氣氛，在這講求團隊互助合作， 鼓勵主動提案改善，不墨守成規，打造活力無限、笑聲不斷、樂在工作的熱血團隊。
2.我們重視技術人才的培育與職涯發展，提供內部技術交流學習、外部訓練課程(公司出資)，透過不同階段工作安排與規劃，工作輪調機制，培育各領域儲備人才，讓每位員工擁有個人發展舞台與空間。
3.我們重視員工生活，公司提供內外部各項參與社團活動、旅遊補助、電影欣賞等，讓您在工作之餘，可以安排個人休閒娛樂，享受工作，樂於生活。
4.內部環境自由，可自由參與其他大數據、PHP、資料庫等學習，不斷增加能力。

【好好薪資】
我們願意提供高於一般行情的薪酬，給具價值的您，確切薪資於面試時，將依實際能力/作品/經驗進行為最終核定，工作年資對我們不是非常重要。
job_lists.other_condition:
加分條件：
1.熟NodeJS、Java、PHP。
2.有一年以上數據開發經驗。
3.有RESTful/ WebService/ AP I開發、串接經驗 。

也歡迎碩博士在校學生Apply，我們彈性的工時可以讓您兼顧學業與工作。
[有相關開發經驗者優先錄取] (面試時需能Demo作品-金融相關尤佳)

job_lists.content: 本公司為社群資料分析的專業領導廠商，提供全國規模最大的網路社群監測與分析平台《OpView社群口碑資料庫》，涵蓋台灣地區九成以上的社群媒體，在數十億筆的雲端資料庫內，即時精確地分析網路上的口碑聲量，是數位行銷時代重要的工具。因此，邀請想投入資料數據產業的各方好手加入，包括資料科學平台設計、深度語意分析、資料科學呈現及前台界面等工程人員。本職務需熟悉程式開發，主要工作內容為：1 網路社群資料擷取及處理2 巨量資料儲存及分析3 分散式與叢集資料庫規劃、設計及維運歡迎Python魔人加入! (也有研發替代役職缺)
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.content: 本公司為社群資料分析的專業領導廠商，提供全國規模最大的網路社群監測與分析平台《OpView社群口碑資料庫》，涵蓋台灣地區九成以上的社群媒體，在數十億筆的雲端資料庫內，即時精確地分析網路上的口碑聲量，是數位行銷時代重要的工具。因此，邀請想投入資料數據產業的各方好手加入，包括資料科學平台設計、深度語意分析、資料科學呈現及前台界面等工程人員。本職務需熟悉程式開發，主要工作內容為：1 資料呈現及前台界面Web設計開發2 資料操作及使用者介面優化研發3 資料庫設計及管理歡迎JavaScript + JSP愛好者加入! (也有研發替代役職缺)

job_lists.title: 【研發替代役】軟體研發工程師 (人工智慧, 機器學習, 語意分析)
job_lists.company: 意藍資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 本公司是國內專注在非結構資料處理的領導廠商，在社群監測、語意分析、及企業搜尋應用上均有最高的市占率。因此，將邀請熟悉人工智慧/機器學習/語意分析的人才加入。工作內容如下：1 在RD部門負責核心程式開發，包括架構及設計2 開發領域為機器學習及語意分析 (machine learning, language processing, semantic analysis)3 對人工智慧, 計算語言學, 認知科學有興趣者尤佳4 需實際開發程式及進行各種實驗
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 具電腦資訊相關學經歷或背景2. 熟C/C++、或Java等程式語言3. 邏輯好、理解力高、喜歡寫程式和做實驗，可閱讀paper。4. 請附專題作品或論文成果。

job_lists.company: 意藍資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 本公司是國內搜尋及語意分析市占率最高的廠商，專注研發非結構資料之數據處理，尋找熟悉C++及物件導向設計的人才加入。工作內容如下：1.在RD部門負責核心程式開發，包括系統設計、架構與演算法設計2.開發領域為搜尋引擎及資訊檢索、語意分析及機器學習、分散式及巨量非結構資料處理
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 邏輯好、理解力高、喜歡研發2. 有Windows或Linux上C++程式開發經驗，熟物件導向設計3. 了解演算法、平行運算或分散式處理、熟高效能編程者佳。

job_lists.content:

2.大數據資料庫的使用推廣, 以期成為產官學研及媒體重要的查詢資料庫

3.須帶領資訊團隊進行專案規劃，具備大數據資料庫建置經驗或資訊背景者佳
4.Proficient in C++, Java, and/or Python. Have experience on developing data analysis or web service projects.
5.Familiar with relational database and NoSQL database e.g. MySQL, Hadoop

Available Positions: Data Scientist / Machine Learning Scientist / Artificial Intelligence Scientist / Optimization Scientist / Intern

1. Python or any other general purpose languages

4. Solid mathematical foundation to understand novel data analysis methods
5. Academic research and conference publications or equivalent research experience

秉持著為消費者打造更美好旅遊的精神，將持續擴增全球旅遊體驗商品版圖，期望將最獨到的在地深度體驗帶給每一位旅行者，創造旅行體驗的最大值。

job_lists.title: 軟體QA工程師(Java)_Software Development Engineer in Test
job_lists.company: 華碩雲端股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 用程式改變世界，別再鍾情於一個人埋頭苦幹!!華碩雲端提供良好的技術開發環境、活潑歡樂的工作氛圍及年輕有朝氣的研發團隊和你切磋技術互相討論。華碩雲端有自行開發的 Object Storage及遍佈全球的用戶，願每位加入的夥伴擁有舞台發揮創新核心技能，讓您產出的應用被全世界使用。我們正在尋找對技術整合有深度渴望、充滿創意又思考無極限，一起影響世界下一步新思維的科技創新狂熱者。歡迎性格活潑善於溝通、對新知充滿好奇，主動、積極並樂於團隊合作的您加入我們，一起寫下屬於我們開創的〝雲〞紀元。我們的團隊開發具備High Availability、Scalability、High Performance 足以服務全世界用戶等級的伺服器端軟體我們要找的人(Software Development Engineer in Test):1. 根據產品規格&Use Case，進行Test plan 設計和編寫工作2. 執行    *相關功能測試(Function testing)    *安全性測試(Security testing)    *使用者測試(Usability testing)    *問題追蹤處理(Bug tracking)    *整合測試(Integration testing)    *壓力測試(Stress testing)等相關測試工作3. 針對產品之安全性、可靠性、效能性、故障恢復等執行整合性測試工作4. 發現產品缺陷，進行開發團隊溝通合作，問題定位與追蹤以及修復後的重新驗證5. 規劃與開發自動化測試工具提高日常任務的效率6. 主動分析問題及積極提供解決方案，以提升公司產品及服務品質
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 大專(含)以上資訊管理(工程)相關系所背景，或具有資訊領域相關的特殊表現2. 熟悉品質管制流程，曾經從事軟體測試、通曉測試理論，了解軟體各種測試類型、方法及技巧者3. 具獨立完成撰寫測試計畫(Test Plan)、測試案例(Test Case)等相關測試實務經驗4. 個性細心並對品質具有高度堅持，對尋找軟體瑕疵有追根究柢的耐性5. 善於工作規劃、溝通協調與團隊合作6. 工作態度積極，具快速學習能力7. 熟悉軟體自動化測試工具或套件者優先錄取8. 有編寫程式能力，能夠輔助測試團隊導入與執行自動化測試

job_lists.title: PHP工程師 PHP Engineer
job_lists.company: Niceday_幸福日子網路股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Niceday 擁有全台灣各式各樣特色體驗，解決不知道去哪裡玩的困擾，並帶給台灣人新的生活經驗！網站 2013/7/1 開站至今已超過25萬人透過 Niceday 開心地出去玩，多次獲得新聞媒體報導，我們認為愛台灣就應該從挖掘台灣的美好開始，想尋找跟我們一起將台灣最棒的活動推廣到全世界的朋友！請先看看我們的網站，你將更認識我們！
Niceday 玩體驗網站：http://www.niceday.tw/

Niceday RD團隊文化：
對於軟體開發有熱忱，喜歡充滿挑戰的新創環境。  
  -  passion for exposing new ideas every single hour 
  -  passion for making robust software 
  -  passion for writing test cases 
  -  passion for challenging status quo

專業技能要求（面試時將會進行簡單的專業技能測驗）： 
＊必備
- 2年以上後端程式開發經驗。
- 熟悉php + mysql，git
- 使用過 php framework, Laravel 或 Symfony 尤佳。

＊以下經驗加分
- 新系統從無到有的開發。
- 使用 noSQL 資料庫。
- 開發 RESTful API。
- 串接第三方 API 或金流。
- 使用 test framework 撰寫 unit test。
- TDD, BDD。
- CI/CD。
- Linux 作業系統下的伺服器管理與效能調校。
- AWS。

工作內容： 
- 既有系統維運，既有系統使用symfony2。
- 新系統開發，預計使用 Laravel。
- 網站基礎設施維護，目前使用aws。

接受這份工作的你，將與 Niceday 玩體驗一同開發出台灣旅遊產業最棒的網站使用經驗，讓更多人從網站開始喜歡台灣，迫不及待來台灣遊玩！
這是一份俱挑戰性的工作，你得熱衷研究新技術、喜歡解決使用者的問題，相信數據！Niceday 是新創公司，期待你願意加入我們共同推出受歡迎的活動。

  2. 提供曾經開發過的專案

job_lists.title: Senior Software Engineer (Java)
job_lists.company: 香港商盛匯信息科技有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
An exciting opportunity to work in accelerating Financial Technology Industry. We invite high caliber to join our new software development team. If you are passionate about technology and finance, and looking for a dynamic growing platform to develop your FinTech career, we would be grateful to hear from you

Responsibilities:
• Work with product owner & BA to understand user requirement
• Design and implement feature based on the requirement from frontend to backend
• Write test to improve product quality, ensure system performance & responsiveness
• Involve in system infrastructure build up, software design and productivity improvement
• Be a mentor to coach junior engineers to quickly involve in project development
• Proactive to find cutting-edge technologies to improve/enhance software design

工作內容 :
• 了解及定義功能需求
• 實作前台至後台的功能開發
• 撰寫測試程式改善產品品質與穩定性
• 參與系統架構設計與實作
• 作為mentor需快速帶領資淺工程師參與開發
• 主動研究新技術改善現有軟體缺失

Basic Qualifications:
• BA/BS degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline, or equivalent practical experience
• 5+ years backend development using Java
• Familiar with Spring ecosystem(Spring Boot, Spring security, Spring MVC, AspectJ, ...), JPA & Hibernate for Java 
• Experience with concurrency & multi-thread/multi-process development
• Experience with object oriented design, design pattern, software design, coding, testing and automation (unit, integration & functional testing)
• Familiar with Windows/Linux Platform (CentOS, Ubuntu)
• Experience with relational databases (transactional and non-transactional) or NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis)
• Self-motivated and good team work

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience developing FinTech (especially Forex) or real-time trading system
• Experience in distributed & scalable system development using message, event and service discovery at large scale & high-throughput
• Experience with Reactive Stream solutions (Reactor, RxJava)
• Experience with message/event solutions (Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis)
• Experienced with service discovery (Zookeeper)
• Experienced with Agile, Scrum development methodology
job_lists.other_condition:
資格條件:
• 大學畢業，資訊相關背景或擁有技術實務經驗
• 5年以上的後台開發經驗，使用Java
• 熟悉Spring相關的frameworks, Hibernate
• Concurrency & multi-thread/multi-process開發經驗
• 有物件導向與使用design pattern的經驗，並運用在軟體設計，實作與測試
• 熟悉Windows或Linux (如CentOS, Ubuntu)
• 關聯式資料庫或NoSQL的使用經驗 (MySQL, MongoDB, Redis)
• 主動且有好的團隊工作態度

若具備以下經歷者優先考慮:
• 有開發外匯或相關FinTech系統經驗
• 參與過分散式系統開發，並使用message, event & service discovery
• 了解Reactive Stream，並有RxJava或Reactor經驗
• Message, event (Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis) 經驗
• Zookeeper經驗
• 敏捷開發相關經驗

job_lists.title: AI軟體研發工程師
job_lists.company: 國立政治大學_創新與創造力研究中心
job_lists.content:
工作內容：
1.軟體開發
2.人工智慧技術研發與實作
3.軟硬體套件模組開發實作
4.無人機智慧控制系統整合測試

專業技術要求：
1.資訊工程、資訊科學或其他相關科系畢業
2.熟悉物件導向程式設計語言，如C, C++, JAVA等
3.熟悉Github開源軟體平台
4.系統開發與實作經驗

工作機構/雇主：國立政治大學
工作地點：台北市，國立政治大學校園
工作時間：依國立政治大學上下班時間

待遇：碩士畢業，每月42,000 ~ 45,000，依工作經驗與能力條件；學士畢業，每月38,000~40,000，依工作經驗與能力條件。年終1.5月月薪。

起聘日：隨到隨聘。

應徵者請檢附相關學經歷、專業技術經驗說明等資料，以PDF電子檔郵寄：drone.nccu@gmail.com。註明：應徵[AI軟體研發工程師]

補充說明：
1.工作職缺來源為科技部研究計畫，由政大資科系四位教授組成之研究團隊，共同研發前瞻人工智慧應用產業。計畫參與人員能學習人工智慧技術，包括認知決策、運動規劃、影像辨識、人機介面等，並以實際無人機產品為系統整合測試平台，實際開發應用導向之無人機智慧控制技術。
2.本計畫與產業界緊密合作，計畫專任人員有機會建立一般業界資訊工程師少有之人工智慧前瞻技術專業，並且能發展軟體硬體整合之控制平台技術經驗，具備高度之無人機產業生涯前景潛力。

job_lists.title: AI Computer Vision Engineer
job_lists.company: 富凱禾股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are a startup company incubated from UT Texas AI Lab, and founded by EV automotive for driving next generation vehicle intelligence. The company is specifically developing deep learning and image processing algorithm/technology in 1) Perceptual sensing area including advanced eye tracking, facial recognition, dynamic gesture, and drowsiness detection; 2) HMI & Image Processing including holographic 3D, UI/VFX design and rendering; 3) ADAS signal processing and sensor fusion; and 4) Application software for embedded system and data link with vehicle ECU, T-box, and mobile Apps.

Job requirement:
‧ The position involves researching, implementing, and productizing solutions for intelligent vehicles specifically for category 1) Perceptual sensing and 2) HMI & Image Processing.
‧ Work with system hardware team in optimizing code into linux based embedded system.

Qualifications:
1. At least Master degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or equivalent.
2. Strong knowledge and experience of Computer Vision and Deep Learning algorithms.
3. Hands on experience with one or more deep learning frameworks such as Caffe, TensorFlow, Theano, or Torch.
4. Strong knowledge of object recognition and tracking, motion recognition, depth sensing, and 3D modeling, or image/video processing.
5. Good mastery of C/C++ and Python.

job_lists.title: Developer, Style.me – Growth Engineering
job_lists.company: Nogle Taiwan Limited_諾傑股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are forming a new Growth Engineering team at Style.me to focus on improving our 3D scanning process and scalability of our virtual try-on platform. You will focus on automating various processes and build software alongside and on top of our existing systems. 

You will also get to work with advanced technology spanning computer graphics, computer vision,physics-based simulation, and our US-patented 3D geometry modeling algorithms.

This is a position that will contribute tremendously to the success of our product launches in the US and then globally. If you are a master software engineer that can navigate complex systems and solve problems creatively, then we would love to talk to you.

Responsibilities:

-  Work with a team of talented engineers to build tools for managing and scaling our 3D scanning process and our virtual try-on platform
-  Work with the product teams to find the optimal way to scale our systems
-  Automate data validation, quality control, and client integration workflows
-  Develop tools to monitor billions of try-ons: Write monitoring and reporting tools to do performance-related tests and analysis
job_lists.other_condition:
Requirements:
- BS degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Operations Research or other technical field.
-  3+ years of software engineering experience using C++, Java, or Python
-  Experience in performance engineering
-  Experience in using various libraries in machine learning and image processing is a plus

job_lists.title: Mobile App Developer
job_lists.company: 典益股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for a mobile app developer to design, develop, and maintain Android and iOS apps. The developer will work the entire app lifecycle right from concept stage until delivery and post launch support. Apps will be mainly content based and integrated closely with the web site and hardware equipments. In addition to delivering the product the successful candidate will be heavily involved in driving the mobile strategy globally.

Main tasks and responsibilities:
1. Acting as iOS and/or Android developer
2. Deliver across the entire app life cycle - concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to app stores and support
3. Gather requirements around functionality and translate those into elegant functional solutions
4. Build prototypes at tech scoping stage of projects
5. Working along the web developer to create and maintain a robust framework to support the apps
6. Working with the front end developer to build the interface with focus on usability features
7. Create compelling device specific user interfaces and experiences
8. Optimizing performance for the apps
9. Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies

Person specifications:
1. Proven commercial software development experience - desktop and mobile
2. Published examples of mobile applications on the App store or the Android market
3. Excellent knowledge in information architecture, human computer interaction and usability design principles
4. Ability to use analytic data and user testing to inform design decision
5. Ability to multi task and good time management skills
6. Ability to work on their own and as a part of the team
7. Excellent scoping and estimation skills
8. Excellent testing / QA skills
9. Excellent communication skills (verbal and written) to liaise with various departments locally and internationally

Essential Skills:
iOS -
 a. Strong OO design and programming skills in Objective-C
 b. Familiar with iOS SDK (UIKit, Cocoa Touch, Core Data, Core Location, etc)
 c. Familiar with xcode
Android -
 a. Strong OO design and programming skills in Java (J2EE/J2ME)
 b. Familiar with the Android SDK
 c. Knowledge of SQLite, MySQL or similar database management system
 d. Familiar with Eclipse
Common -
 a. Understanding of other compiled languages
 b. Experience on web service integration (SOAP, REST, JSON, XML)
 c. Experience of development using web technologies
 d. Good understanding of OO programming and design patterns
 e. Good understanding of HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, and PHP
 f. Experience building web and native apps
 g. Ads integration using 3rd party ad server (DART)
 h. Using version control (e.g. SVN)
 i. Excellent debugging and optimization skills

Desirable Skills:
 a. PHP frameworks (e.g. Zend)
 b. PHP template engines (e.g. Smarty)
 c. Creative design skills
 d. Working with a content management system
job_lists.other_condition:
Competencies for success:
1. Creativity
2. Learning on the Fly
3. Technical Learning
4. Action Orientated
5. Dealing with Ambiguity
6. Presentation Skills
7. Peer Relationships
8. Time Management
9. Written Communications
10. Problem Solving

job_lists.content: We are looking for talented and passionate Embedded Software Engineer to be part of an exciting team. Preferred Qualifications: - Strong debugging/trouble-shooting skills of embedded systems - Expertise with Linux kernel and application software development - Experience with real time debugging tools (software and hardware) - Experience with at least one scripting language

to customers.Post-Design Win Support-Assist the customer in design, integration, development, debug, and system test to ensure production suitability by acting as a focal point between customer and Orbweb technical support teams.-Support the customer product life cycle through extensive technical knowledge and Orbweb roadmap vision.-Provide advice and support on upgrades and new feature set enhancements.-Reduce time-to-market by managing the overall software solution to get design wins into production as rapidly as possible.Requirements:- Degree (BS or MS) in Computer Science or networking protocols.- Relevant experience will include detailed understanding of NGN, and Routing software architectures.- Ability to work in a small field based team environment essential, with capability to travel extensively within APAC region, supporting pre-sales client opportunities.- Knowledge of: (1) C/C++ programming, (2) Embedded C development (2) Ethernet switching(2) TCP/IP protocol (3) IP routing(4) Linux architecture and application development tools

job_lists.title: [點點印] 網站研發工程師 Web Developer
job_lists.company: 點點印_黑米數位股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
【職務】
網站研發 Web Developer

【主要工作內容】
網站功能開發：http://www.tintint.com
相片書編輯工具開發

【工作說明】
點點印的任務，是透過網路技術，讓大家把自己的照片做成書。

照片在哪裡，我們就往哪邊發展。我們的挑戰是，如何透過網路技術，設計夠好用的工具，流暢的介面，突破技術瓶頸，讓使用者在網路上，就可以自己編排，把照片變成實體的相片書。不只介面必須流暢，也要能很精準印製成書，WYSIWYG！

  如：卡片編輯：http://goo.gl/K6oEt4
        臉書快拍卡編輯：http://goo.gl/Nsflc5
        線上電子書： http://goo.gl/6Cl8qX

【網路＋技術＋拍照】
我們是一群，熱愛網路，喜歡拍照。希望透過網路技術，打造很棒的產品，讓世界更美好。
在這裡，不只是有機會接觸到最新的技術，我們還可以透過技術，製作出充滿設計感的相片書。

如果你也一樣，喜歡網路，希歡拍照，喜歡網路紀錄來創造更美好的生活，那你應該會喜歡點點印。

【需要專業技能】
我們會需要使用到以下技術，如果您是會有研究過，或是已經熟悉，
符合越多項，越是我們需要的人！

◆ 網站開發 : Web Developer
- git / cvs 等版本控制工具 (我們使用 git 做版本控制)
- 網站開發經驗 (歡迎附上作品)

◆ 前端：Front-End Web Developer
- HTML / CSS (當然要有辦法從無到有寫出 HTML / CSS，控制自如)
- JavaScript (我們有很多從無到有自行開發的 JS library)
- jQuery (Node.js / AngularJS) 
- PHP / Ruby on Rails 等 Server Side 程式 (我們使用 PHP)
- Web Framework，如 Ruby on Rails (我們使用自行開發的 php MVC framework)
- DataBase，如 MySQL (我們使用 MySQL)
- RWD 
- Susy / Scss

◆ 後端：Back-End Web Developer
- PHP 等 Server Side 程式 (我們使用 PHP)
- Web Framework，如 Ruby on Rails (我們使用自行開發的 php MVC framework)
- 熟悉 DataBase，如 MySQL (我們使用 mysql)
- 喜歡研究 Design Pattern，對網路程式架構有異於常人的興趣
- 喜歡解決問題
- 熟悉 UNIX，習慣使用 command line 工作寫程式。


◆ 開發流程 / 環境
開發流程，我們使用 git / scrum / kanban / slack / hangout 等溝通，可遠端開發。

自由開放的開發環境，鼓勵 Developer 一起參與產品設計過程，一起打造很棒的產品，用網路技術來讓世界更美好。

job_lists.title: 雲端工程師Cloud Engineer
job_lists.company: Amazon Web Services Taiwan Limited_台灣亞馬遜網路服務有限公司
job_lists.content: About this JobThis is a remote technical support role (NOT call center) who should be an expert in various IT areas and provide timely and professional troubleshooting advice and architectural best practice to AWS customers via support cases and occasional on-site visits.Within the team, we have gurus used to work on Linux kernel drivers, with PhD in High-Performance Computing (HPC) and as senior networking Operation & Maintenance (O&M) engineer.We are seeking people with strong technical skills. Experience with Big Data and/or Database (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle)? Do you know the advantages of working in a highly distributed virtual environment? Since we’re working in the Cloud, you will need to be very comfortable with networking technologies including DNS, TCP/IP, SSL, DHCP and Load Balancing. If you fit the description, you might be the person we are looking for!Every Day Will Bring New And Exciting Challenges On The Job While You•Learn and use groundbreaking technologies•Apply advanced troubleshooting techniques to provide unique solutions to our customers' individual needs•Interact with leading technologists around the world•Work directly with Amazon Web Service architects to help reproduce and resolve customer issues•Leverage your extensive customer support experience to provide feedback to internal AWS teams on how to improve our services•Drive customer communication during critical events•Drive projects that improve support-related processes and our customers’ technical support experience•Write tutorials, how-to videos, and other technical articles for the AWS customer community•Work on critical, highly complex customer problems that may span multiple AWS servicesBasic Qualification•Strong customer focus•Must have demonstrated expertise in the below areas:•Networking (DNS, TCP/IP, HTTP, VLAN, etc.)•Systems administration (Linux and/or Windows Servers)•Bachelor’s degree in Information Science / Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or a related field.•Excellent oral and written communication skills in both English and Mandarin•Open to working shifts (e.g. 7am-4pm or 2pm-11pm, Sun-Thu or Tue-Sat)•Strong multi-tasking skills•Self-starter who is excited about technology
job_lists.other_condition: Preferred Qualification•Big Data (Hadoop, Map/Reduce, etc.)•Databases (MySQL, Oracle, MS SQL Server, etc.)•Virtualization (OpenStack, Xen, KVM, etc.) •Programming / scripting (Java, Perl, Ruby, C#, and/or PHP)•Exposure to Cloud computing•Exposure to security concepts / best practices•Expertise with IPsec, VPN, Load Balancing, Iperf, MTR, Routing Protocols, SSH, Network Monitoring / Troubleshooting tools•Experience managing full application stacks from the OS up through custom applications•Remote technical support or system administrator experience

job_lists.title: 暑期實習--資料科學家 Data Scientist Intern
job_lists.company: 一動數據股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
職務說明 [About us]
我們利用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 和統計模型 (Statistical Modeling) 從海量數據 (Big Data) 中挖掘各式使用者行為和能付諸行動的洞見與觀察 (Actionable Insights)，進而建立數據產品 (Data Products)，將其應用在廣告投放，電商成效優化、O2O 等各種領域。我們希望建置一個由電腦科學家、統計學家和心理學家等跨領域組成的數據科學團隊 (Data Science Team)，深信著 “Data Drives Transactions”。
團隊的發展重點為廣告競價平台 (Real-Time Bidding Demand-Side Platform) 、數據管理平台 (Data Management Platform)，團隊的使命是幫助企業提升顧客終生價值 (Customer Lifetime Value)。

[You are...]
歡迎對機器學習和統計數據分析有高度興趣、喜歡團隊合作，又能獨當一面的你加入，一起打造最領先的數據產品，用數據推動商業世界！

[Your jobs...]
#1 應用大數據分析技術對智慧型手機用戶行為進行分析，為各級管理層提供資料支援
#2 研發先進資料處理技術: 建立統計模型、開發資料分析演算法及相關資料結構設計
#3 國際參考文獻探勘
job_lists.other_condition:
[You must have...]
#1 電腦科學、機器學習、數學、統計等相關專業。
#2喜歡行動產業，對待資料認真、謹慎。
#3對資料有高度敏感性與高度熱情，能團隊合作，有良好人際溝通能力。
#4具有足夠程式設計能力，可實作新穎統計分析方法。
#5 熟悉或可快速學習大數據處理相關技術與工具，如：SQL、Spark、Python、Java、Scala。

job_lists.title: 人工智慧科學家 / 資深人工智慧科學家（臺北）
job_lists.company: 香港商慧科訊業有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
工作職責：
方向一：深度學習
• 從事深度學習與機器學習相關技術的研究。
• 提出基於深度學習技術的演算法方案，解決自動化中文自然語言處理與理解中的挑戰。
• 與開發工程師合作以實現新技術的轉移與產品化。
方向二：自然語言處理與語意分析
• 從事自然語言處理、語意分析、及知識圖譜相關技術的研究。
• 演算法研究與設計，涉及實體識別、關係抽取、語意消歧、實體連結、以及知識圖譜構建、推理及挖掘等。
• 與開發工程師合作以實現新技術的轉移與產品化。
job_lists.other_condition:
職位要求：
• 電腦科學與工程或相關專業，優秀的學術成績。
• 資深人工智慧科學家：需要博士學位，及3年以上博士後研究經驗。
• 人工智慧科學家：需要博士學位、或碩士學位加3年以上研究經驗。
• 具備傑出的數學與推理能力並對研究方法有良好的認知。
• 具備下述至少一個研究領域的知識與經驗（深度學習、自然語言處理、語意分析、文本挖掘、機器學習、或知識圖譜等）。
• 熟悉Linux開發環境，精通至少一門程式設計語言(Java或Python)。
• 具備中文自然語言處理的研究經驗與技能將會優先考慮。
• 優秀的口頭與書面交流與表達能力。
• 善於獨立完成工作，同時具備良好的團隊協作能力。

job_lists.title: Senior Data Scientists
job_lists.company: Algorythma_ADFG TECHNOLOGIES LTD
job_lists.content:
Job Description 
We are looking for motivated and enthusiastic technical professionals for multiple openings for Senior Machine Learning Engineers / Researchers in a fast growing team of high-energy and world-class talent. The candidate must be capable of developing challenge products related to machine learning, computer vision, NLP, data science and IOT. 

 Algorythma is a well-funded start-up company focused on developing game-changing products, using cutting edge technology in the markets of next generation financial systems, investment platforms, education, Fintech, multimedia streaming and others. Selected candidates are to play a key role in the creation, design and implementation of machine learning algorithms, including deep learning, in our products. If you love to innovate and deliver results, then we want you to be on our team. Additionally, the candidate must be willing to relocate to Abu Dhabi, UAE. 
Major Responsibilities
• Work within our machine learning team to research,design, code, train, test, deploy and iterate on new commercial products
• Perform applied research and create innovative solutions in the areas of machine learning, deep learning, data mining, IOT, AI and HCI algorithms
• Collaborate with software engineering teams, HCI design teams and product teams to integrate experimental capabilities into large-scale production systems
• Work with external technology service providers and / or research institutions to deliver viable solutions
Basic Qualifications
• Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Math, or any related field(s)
• Proven record of building machine learning, and data mining systems
• 4+ years of software development experience with strong skills in Python, Java, and / or C/C++
• Experience in working with machine learning and computer vision software packages (e.g., Opencv, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Caffe, Theano, Torch, R, Matlab / Octave)
• Strong problem solving skills; must be able to work independently, but also be a co-operative team player.
job_lists.other_condition:
Preferred Qualifications
• Quantitative PhD will be considered as a plus point
• Strong understanding of algorithms, data structures, software design and parallel processing. Must have the ability to pick up new technologies quickly
• Strong background in one of the following fields; research publications in the same fields will be considered as a plus point:
o Machine learning and data mining, with a broad understanding of unsupervised and supervised learning methods
o Deep learning and reinforcement learning
• Result-oriented with a strong customer focus. Must have the ability to communicate well and discuss complex topics with both technical and business-related audiences

job_lists.content: 工研院「巨量資訊科技中心」徵求有人工智慧 (AI) 領域背景之工程師，包括：電腦視覺 (computer vision)、自然語言處理 (natural language processing)、機器學習 (machine learning)等。從事深層學習 (deep learning)演算法、增強式學習 (reinforcement learing)演算法、物件辨識分類 (object detection and classification)、虛擬對話機器人 (virtual assistant) 等技術研發。本中心集合了一群優秀之機器學習與數理統計專長之資料科學家，您可在此學習到最新的人工智慧技術、資料分析技術、軟體系統研發能力、以及產業界合作經驗。

job_lists.title: iOS/Android 軟體研發工程師
job_lists.company: 柯思科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 我們以深厚的技術實力、從專業的客製專案建置構架、與完整的行銷流程，來協助客戶創建各種類型電子商務系統、生產運營管理平台及行動裝置APP系統。具備資料分析與系統優化配置能力，具備軟硬體系統集成能力，協助客戶形成最佳系統配置。柯思科技在數位金融(Fintech)、電子商務(E-commerce)、物聯網(IOT)及大數據與人工智慧(BigData&AI)有深刻的技術及經驗。我們在台灣從專案開始，擅長於打造從0到1的新創事業，現在我們更關注於新創項目的國際複製及擴大。因我們對於品質的堅持並提供完善的服務，我們獲得許多合作廠商的肯定，目前已承接『工研院』『資策會』『各大銀行』等的中大型開發專案。【需求條件】1. 大學以上資訊相關科系 (資工、資管、資科等)2. 工作經驗不拘3. 勇於學習與獨立思考，樂於團隊溝通合作。【專業能力】1、有良好的使用者介面，用戶端應用程式的設計經驗，有上線產品經驗者優先。2、有扎實的Java語言基礎；熟悉Android 或 iOS框架及SDK，熟悉物件導向程式設計，理解設計模式等。3、熟悉 Android 或 iOS 內部和底層的框架結構 。4、兼具HTML5開發經驗者優先。【其他要求說明】1.手機系統開發經驗，開發過一兩款成熟產品。2.熟悉下列之相關技術優先：Java scripts, AJAX, JQuery, CSS。3.熟悉C++/C#/php語言優先考慮。4.了解 android 或 iOS 系統源碼優先考慮。5. 精通 C++6. 對網路與行動網路事業有熱情

job_lists.content: 1.資料探勘、統計分析，與機器學習方法創新與研發。2.資料分析模組與系統之程式開發。3.協助技術應用與現場導入。使用各式資料探勘技術，如決策樹、支持向量機、邏輯迴歸、關連規則分析、歸群、多變量分析等演算方法，解決傳統產業製造現場所遭遇的各種資料分析問題，並依照問題需求，進行資料品質與轉換等前處理，以及調整或修改演算方法。 協助應用現場的技術導入，開發資料分析系統，在所需的環境與平台上，介接客戶資訊系統，設計使用情境並開發使用者介面，解決現場導入之問題。
job_lists.other_condition: 1.主要使用Matlab,R Tool,Java 與C++語言開發。2.請檢附相當於TOEIC 650分之英語測驗成績證明(具英語系國家學歷或正式工作經歷者可免)，如無法提供，將安排參加本院英文檢測。
